Name: Lisa's Special Daiquiri
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of grapefruit zest twist.
EXPRESS grapefruit zest twist over cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Reminiscent of a Hemingway Special, this flavoursome, vanilla-laced Daiquiri has a wonderfully tangy, bittersweet finish.
History: Created in 2003 by yours truly for a fan of both Daiquiris and pink grapefruit juice.
Nutrition: One serving of Lisa's Special Daiquiri contains 247 calories
